breast_lump: Where exactly is the lump located?
When did you first notice it?
Has the size changed since you first noticed it?
Do you perform regular breast self-exams?
breast_pain: Is the pain in one breast or both?
Does it change with your menstrual cycle?
How would you rate the pain from 1-10?
nipple_discharge: Is it from one breast or both?
Is it spontaneous or only when pressed?
When did you first notice it?
irregular_periods: How long has your cycle been irregular?
What's the typical length between periods?
Have you noticed any pattern to the irregularity?
Are you currently using any hormonal contraception?
heavy_periods: How many pads/tampons do you use per day?
Does it affect your daily activities?
Have you experienced any dizziness or extreme fatigue?
pelvic_pain: Where exactly is the pain located?
Is it constant or does it come and go?
Does it occur during specific activities?
Is it related to your menstrual cycle?
Have you had any previous pelvic surgeries?
hot_flashes: How long do they typically last?
Do they occur at specific times?
morning_sickness: How often do you experience nausea?
What time of day is it worst?
Are you able to keep food down?

breast_cancer: Do you have a family history of breast cancer?
Have you had any previous breast biopsies?
At what age did you get your first period?
Have you ever given birth? If yes, at what age was your first full-term pregnancy?
Are you currently using or have you used hormone replacement therapy?
cervical_cancer: When was your last Pap smear?
Have you ever had an abnormal Pap result?
Have you been vaccinated against HPV?
Do you smoke or have you smoked in the past?
Have you had multiple sexual partners?
ovarian_cancer: Do you have a family history of ovarian cancer?
Have you ever used oral contraceptives?
Have you ever been diagnosed with endometriosis?
